titleStmt.title: The round-heads catechisme or the netwer catechising the Anabaptists Puritans, seperatists, and well-affected under the name of round-heads. With the joynt answer to the same.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare of our Lord, 1643.

notesStmt.note: Anonymous; last page reads: the author dwell's in Angell alley in whit-Chappell. Also he will be thankefull to you, if you will buy of him good peniworths of sugar, spices or small wares.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
